title: Quotes Poems and Thoughts: With Pictures from Prince Edward Island, Canada
description: This is a book of inspirational quotes along with pictures taken on our beautiful Province of Prince Edward Island Canada. A mix of photography and inspirations that we find and short poems I have written. It can also be accessed for Amazon and a variety of other formats via Books2Read on my book listings at books2read.com/Prince-Edward-Island
author: E. Jean Simpson
